# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/vue-i18n`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for vue-i18n (https://github.com/kazupon/vue-i18n).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/vue-i18n

 * Dependencies: vue
 * Global values: none
